creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
description: standing woman wearing bold-patterned kimono, zori sandals, white tobi socks and a hat with looped ribbons, holding a tiny cup in her PL hand, in front of an undulating woven bamboo mat on the exterior of a building; man seated with knees drawn up on roof of building, URQ
signed: on back, in pencil: Kamaitachi #28, 1968 / (artist\'s signature in Japanese) / Eikoh Hosoe
title: Kamaitachi #28
